name: Binalyze
description: Binalyze is the developer of AIR, the world’s fastest, end-to-end Digital Forensics and Incident Response (DFIR) platform. AIR offers a combination of powerful automation, advanced integration features, and a user-friendly collaborative interface. This comprehensive solution assists SOC teams and incident responders to efficiently resolve incident response cases. By doing so, it significantly shortens dwell times and enhances cyber resilience.AIR’s suite of capabilities includes remote evidence acquisition and automated intelligence-driven evidence analyzers. Its core Triage, Timeline, and interACT remote shell features speed up investigation and remediation efforts. The AIR Investigation Hub sits at the heart of the platform to provide an integrated view of case-related evidence and insights to seamlessly and consistently manage investigations.

name: Branch of LinkShadow MDMC
description: t LinkShadow, our goal is to be at the forefront of the ever-evolving world of cybersecurity. We strive to adopt new architectural approaches that not only protect our clients' digital assets but also enhance their overall security posture. Our commitment to innovation has led us to adopt the cutting-edge concept of Cyber Security Mesh Architecture (CSMA).We call this the LinkShadow Cyber Mesh PlatformCSMA is a revolutionary approach that aims to provide a comprehensive and dynamic security framework for organizations. Unlike traditional security architectures that rely on a siloed-based approach, CSMA embraces the idea of a distributed and interconnected network of security controls. This approach ensures that security is not limited to a single point of failure but is instead woven throughout the entire network, providing a more robust and resilient defense against cyber threats.The key idea behind CSMA is to create a mesh of security controls that work together intelligently to detect, prevent, and respond to cyber threats. This intelligent network detection and response (NDR) capability is the core of our offering. By leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, we empower organizations to proactively identify and mitigate threats in real-time, minimizing the potential impact of security incidents.At LinkShadow, we understand that cybersecurity is not a one-size-fits-all solution. Each organization has unique requirements, challenges, and risk profiles. That's why we take a tailored approach to our solutions, working closely with our clients to understand their specific needs and design a CSMA framework that aligns with their business objectives.Our team of highly skilled cybersecurity experts brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the table. With their deep understanding of the evolving threat landscape, they are constantly researching, developing, and refining our Cyber Mesh Platform to stay ahead of emerging threats.We are proud to partner with organizations across various industries, helping them build a robust cybersecurity foundation that enables them to focus on their core business without compromising on security. Join us on this journey as we strive to be the forerunner in adopting new architectural approaches, such as Cyber Security Mesh Architecture, and revolutionize the way organizations approach cybersecurity.Contact us today to learn more about how LinkShadow's Cyber Mesh Platform and intelligent NDR capabilities can help safeguard your digital assets and protect your organization from evolving cyber threats.
htmlDescription:
t LinkShadow, our goal is to be at the forefront of the ever-evolving world of cybersecurity. We strive to adopt new architectural approaches that not only protect our clients' digital assets but also enhance their overall security posture. Our commitment to innovation has led us to adopt the cutting-edge concept of Cyber Security Mesh Architecture (CSMA).We call this the LinkShadow Cyber Mesh Platform

CSMA is a revolutionary approach that aims to provide a comprehensive and dynamic security framework for organizations. Unlike traditional security architectures that rely on a siloed-based approach, CSMA embraces the idea of a distributed and interconnected network of security controls. This approach ensures that security is not limited to a single point of failure but is instead woven throughout the entire network, providing a more robust and resilient defense against cyber threats.

The key idea behind CSMA is to create a mesh of security controls that work together intelligently to detect, prevent, and respond to cyber threats. This intelligent network detection and response (NDR) capability is the core of our offering. By leveraging advanced analytics, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, we empower organizations to proactively identify and mitigate threats in real-time, minimizing the potential impact of security incidents.

At LinkShadow, we understand that cybersecurity is not a one-size-fits-all solution. Each organization has unique requirements, challenges, and risk profiles. That's why we take a tailored approach to our solutions, working closely with our clients to understand their specific needs and design a CSMA framework that aligns with their business objectives.

Our team of highly skilled cybersecurity experts brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the table. With their deep understanding of the evolving threat landscape, they are constantly researching, developing, and refining our Cyber Mesh Platform to stay ahead of emerging threats.

We are proud to partner with organizations across various industries, helping them build a robust cybersecurity foundation that enables them to focus on their core business without compromising on security. Join us on this journey as we strive to be the forerunner in adopting new architectural approaches, such as Cyber Security Mesh Architecture, and revolutionize the way organizations approach cybersecurity.

Contact us today to learn more about how LinkShadow's Cyber Mesh Platform and intelligent NDR capabilities can help safeguard your digital assets and protect your organization from evolving cyber threats.

members.jobTitle: DIrector IT / Zero trust solution architect
members.biography:
A seasoned IT and cybersecurity executive, I bring over two decades of experience architecting and securing enterprise-grade infrastructure across public and private sector environments. Rising from Principal Systems Engineer to Director of IT at Ebryx, I have evolved into a strategic Zero Trust Solutions Architect specializing in secure-by-design architecture for global organizations.

With deep, hands-on expertise in Linux, Windows, cloud platforms, and modern infrastructure operations, I lead the design and implementation of Zero Trust–aligned environments grounded in frameworks such as NIST 800-207, ISO 27001, CIS, GDPR, and emerging ZT standards. My work spans secure architecture development, compliance-driven risk reduction, and large-scale IT modernization for internal operations and Fortune 500 clients.

A signature achievement of my career is architecting and driving the deployment of Invisily, Ebryx’s proprietary Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) platform—built with a focus on scalability, identity-centric access control, and modern threat-resilience. As a senior leader, I collaborate closely with cybersecurity, engineering, and GRC teams to deliver solutions that elevate security posture, simplify operations, and support the shift toward perimeter-less environments.

At Black Hat, my focus is on advancing conversations around Zero Trust transformation, secure access modernization, and the practical challenges organizations face while adopting ZTNA at enterprise scale.

members.biography: Penetration Tester & Red Team Instructor | Founder & CTO @HackerSploit | Trained Over 500,000 Cyber Security Professionals | DEF CON Speaker | Author of Privilege Escalation Techniques | Head of CYBER RANGES Community Alexis Ahmed is an experienced penetration tester and security researcher. He started off his career as a Linux system administrator and soon discovered a passion and aptitude for information security and transitioned into the role of a Jr Penetration Tester. In 2017, he founded HackerSploit, a Cybersecurity consultancy company that specializes in Penetration Testing, Red Teaming & Cloud security, where he currently works as a Sr Penetration Tester and Cybersecurity Instructor. HackerSploit is globally acknowledged as one of the best sources for free Cybersecurity training. Alexis has extensive experience in providing self-paced and live Penetration Testing & Red Team training to students and professionals and has worked with recognized training providers like INE, Packt, and EC-Council to develop Cybersecurity training programs and certifications. In the Infosec & Cybersecurity community, Alexis is better known as HackerSploit. That is his platform as a content creator on YouTube. His channel has a massive audience of over 700,000 subscribers! Alexis, as HackerSploit, delivers training content related to Penetration Testing, Red Teaming & Malware Analysis. His core abilities revolve around the following skills: • Extensive Vulnerability Analysis & Patching • Internal / External Network Penetration Testing + Red Team Operations • Active Directory Penetration Testing • Wireless Network Penetration Testing & Security • Web Application Penetration & Security Testing + Patching • Setup & Configuration of Secure Enterprise/Corporate Infrastructure • Network Traffic Capture & Analysis • Social Engineering + OSINT • Linux System Administration & Linux Server Security + Hardening • AWS Penetration Testing, Security & Compliance • Bash & Python Scripting At CYBER RANGES Alexis heads the company's community outreach programme, including Webinars, Boothcamps, LiveFIRE XC sessions, CTFs and supports the "Top 10 Abilities" Programme (top10abilities.org).

members.biography: Dr. Basel Alothman is the Founder and Managing Director of Kuwait Hackers LLC. Alothman currently interesting in information security teaching, solutions, and researching like Towards using Transfer Learning for Botnet Detection. Alothman received his Ph.D. in information security at DeMontfort University, Leicester, UK. He received his M.Sc. in Computer Science from the University of Hertfordshire, with a specialization in cybersecurity. In addition to his work as a hacking instructor and penetration-testing expert, Alothman's research interests include machine learning for botnet detection and malware analysis for intrusion detection and prevention, OSINT. Also, Alothman holds many professional certificates such as CPTE, ECSA, CeH, C-WAST, and Advanced OSINT. Additionally, he is a member of various scientific and professional associations like ISSA, ISACA, BSC, IEEE.

Dr. Omar Al Ibrahim is a co-founder of Kuwait Hackers LLC. Before then, Dr. Omar worked with two reputable information security consulting firms in the United States as a security consultant namely Virtual Security Research (VSR) and Cigital Inc. specialized in application security and penetration testing. Afterwards, Dr. Omar joined Lookout Inc. as a security intelligence engineer where he focused on reverse engineering and threat hunting of mobile malware. He received his Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) in Computer Science from Southern Methodist University (USA), Dallas in 2012 and his Master's degree in Computer Science from Rice University (USA) in 2007. He is a GIAC Reverse Engineer Malware (GREM) certified and holds the Certified Information System Security Professional (CISSP).

Dr. Sulaiman Alhasawi brings a quarter-century of experience in IT and Cybersecurity, with a pronounced specialization in Operational Technology (OT) cybersecurity over the last decade-plus. His expertise has been showcased at prominent gatherings such as the Kuwait Hackers Conference, Kaspersky Industrial Cybersecurity Conference, and CGSC 2023.

Beyond speaking engagements, Dr. Alhasawi is a prolific writer of technical content, disseminating his knowledge via LinkedIn and his dedicated blog at zerontek.com. His YouTube channel, 'ICS Arabia', is a hub for dialogue with peers in the cybersecurity realm.

Dr. Sulaiman Alhasawi actively enriches the open-source community by developing and contributing to a range of ICS/OT cybersecurity projects on GitHub. His repository is a well-regarded collection of tools and resources, aiding professionals to fortify their cybersecurity capabilities. Parallel to his online contributions, Dr. Alhasawi's dedication is equally tangible in the industrial sector, where he offers strategic cybersecurity counsel to enhance local industry defenses.

name: ThreatQuotient, Inc
description: ThreatQuotient improves security operations by fusing together disparate data sources, tools and teams to accelerate threat detection and response. ThreatQuotient’s data-driven security operations platform helps teams prioritize, automate and collaborate on security incidents; enables more focused decision making; and maximizes limited resources by integrating existing processes and technologies into a unified workspace. The result is reduced noise, clear priority threats, and the ability to automate processes with high fidelity data. ThreatQuotient’s industry leading data management, orchestration and automation capabilities support multiple use cases including incident response, threat hunting, spear phishing, alert triage, vulnerability prioritisation, and can also serve as a threat intelligence platform. ThreatQuotient is headquartered in Northern Virginia with international operations based out of Europe, MENA and APAC. For more information, visit www.threatquotient.com.

name: Zscaler

members.biography:
With two decades of experience in Information Technology, I am dedicated to transforming complex challenges into elegant solutions that align with business objectives. I am passionate about influencing industry standards and fostering progressive security practices.
Throughout my career, Zero Trust principles have always been the focal point of my strategies, whether for my own organization or as an advisor to my customers. As these principles necessitate an increasing amount of visibility beyond human capacity, AI and Machine Learning provide much-needed assistance in processing vast amounts of information and making critical decisions in a short time, which can be crucial in stopping or preventing ongoing offenses.

Kevin Schwarz ist bei Zscaler als Leiter des CTO Teams in EMEA. Er berät Behörden und Unternehmen in Digitalisierungsprojekten mit dem Fokus auf IT-Sicherheit und IT-Transformation. Für diese Position bringt er mehrjährige Erfahrung im Produkt, Projekt- & Programm-Management mit, wo er u.a. verantwortlich war für die Standardisierung der globalen Netzwerksicherheit eines Dax 30 Konzerns, Software-Entwicklungsprojekte und große globale Infrastrukturprojekte im Telekommunikations- & Security-Bereich.

Tony Fergusson has more than 25 years of experience in networking, security, and IT leadership across a variety of industries. Described as having a "visionary mindset," Fergusson was one of the earliest adopters of zero trust networking principles in 2015. A passionate advocate for reducing enterprise attack surfaces, he was the very first Zscaler customers to implement Zscaler Private Access for his organisation and to apply zero trust principles to OT devices. Most recently prior to Zscaler, Fergusson led MAN Energy Solutions' secure cloud transformation, including its award-winning digital transformation to zero trust network architecture. He sees innovation and out-of-the-box thinking as keys to understanding and outpacing cyber adversaries.

Too many time-consuming processes._x000D_
Too many vulnerabilities to find, and not enough skilled people to do it._x000D_
And this needs to stop._x000D_
_x000D_
We have designed Yogosha as a VOC – a Vulnerability Operations Center.
htmlDescription:
Yogosha was born out of our deepest belief: the approach and understanding of cybersecurity needs a change. A big one._x000D_
_x000D_
By nature, cybersecurity will always be complex, tricky. But security solutions shouldn’t make it more difficult. If anything, they should make it easier._x000D_
_x000D_
There are too many tools and solutions._x000D_
Too many time-consuming processes._x000D_
Too many vulnerabilities to find, and not enough skilled people to do it._x000D_
And this needs to stop._x000D_
_x000D_
We have designed Yogosha as a VOC – a Vulnerability Operations Center.

name: TechArch
description: The rapid shifting in ICT culture and mindset from “traditional” IT systems to more agility and innovative digital platforms made cybersecurity to be more challenging. Jumping to deploy complex solutions before defining the root causes of the problem, led the organizations to make investment over investment, and yet, security managers are not able to sleep in peace at night. Our practice leaders experienced this before, so we know the pain and know what it requires to take it away. From the inception of TechArch, our mission was defining professional practices that help our customers to optimize their investments in cybersecurity by providing them independent and vendor-neutral consultations and guidanceOur team are seasoned experts in cybersecurity field, who bring years of skills and knowledge in industry-specific adversaries’ Tactics, Techniques, and Procedures. htmlDescription:
**Smart Technology Solutions: Pioneering Cybersecurity and IT Innovation**


**Overview:**

Founded in 2007 and headquartered in Saudi Arabia, Smart Technology Solutions (Smart) has carved a niche in the IT and cybersecurity landscape of the Middle East and Africa. As a Saudi company with a presence in Jeddah, Riyadh, Khobar, Cairo, and beyond, Smart offers a comprehensive range of IT services, emphasizing cybersecurity, cloud solutions, ERP, Educational and custom software development.


**What Sets Us Apart:**

Smart’s approach is unique, blending cutting-edge technology with a strong emphasis on human values and client relationships. We view our clients not just as customers but as partners and integral members of the Smart family. Our diverse team of experts is driven by ten core values, including delivering exceptional service, embracing change, and pursuing continuous growth and learning.


**Our Expertise:**

With over 16 years of experience, we specialize in a variety of services:


- Cybersecurity Solutions: Providing robust protection against digital threats.

- Cloud & DevOps: Offering scalable and efficient cloud-based services.

- Managed IT Services & MSP: Ensuring seamless IT operations for businesses.

- Software Development: Crafting tailor-made applications Mobile Apps, Web Apps, Website, UX/UI and a lot of other software solutions.

- EduIT: Specialized IT solutions for the educational, training, Learning and development sector.

- IT Procurement and delivery: Streamlined acquisition of cutting-edge IT equipment and software.

- Business Applications: Advanced solutions in Odoo, Oracle, and SAP ERP systems, enhancing operational efficiency and decision-making. And other business applications like HR systems, recruitment systems, ticketing systems, customer service systems, customer relationship management systems (CRM) , project management system and much more.

- IT Project Implementation: Expert management and execution of IT projects, encompassing everything from infrastructure setup to software deployment. for example but not limited to Datacenters, infrastructure, structured Canling and low current, networking, physical security solutions, surveillance and camera solutions, access control and a lot other solution.

**Why Choose Smart:**

At Smart, we don’t just deliver IT solutions; we empower businesses to achieve their full potential. By choosing us, you're partnering with a company that values innovation, integrity, and above all, the success of its clients.


Join us at BlackHat to explore how Smart can be your guide in the ever-evolving world of technology and cybersecurity.

name: Shifra FZ LLC
description: Shifra is an information security solutions provider based out of Dubai Production City in the United Arab Emirates. With a focus on Data Security, Identity and Access Management and Vulnerability Management, Shifra provides expertise to enterprises around the region in securing their most valuable asset: information.The name Shifra originates from the word “sifr”, the Arabic numeral zero which was later used to describe a cipher that then created a coded message, thus forming the basis of encryption as we know it today. Encryption today is at the core of most solutions that protect information while being communicated, or at rest on data repositories and devices.With a highly talented pool of individuals who understand security from its top level management implications, down to the technical details of securing your information systems, Shifra is the partner of choice for organizations who are looking to secure their information assets while maximizing their business efficiency and return on investment.Whether it be a possible intrusion via your network, or a lost portable device in a taxi cab, information loss is a serious threat to your business and should not be ignored. Shifra will help your organization identify those areas and apply the most appropriate solution to match your specific needs and requirements.

name: SARP SIBER GUVENLIK ARGE ANONIM SIRKETI
description: As a cyber threat intelligence company, SOCRadar provides comprehensive threat intelligence and security automation capabilities to help organizations detect, investigate, and respond to cyber threats in real time. The company aims to provide a safer digital world and sustain a better security surface while prioritizing proactive security and constantly analyzing the hacker mindset. SOCRadar supports enterprises in maximizing the efficiency of their security teams with false-positive, free, actionable, and contextualized threat intelligence.Cyber threat intelligence involves routine tasks that are often performed manually. These tasks may include collecting data from various sources, analyzing collected data, and identifying potential threats. While automation and machine learning can significantly reduce the manual workload, human expertise remains essential for recognizing the context, validating the accuracy of intelligence, and making strategic data-driven decisions.SOCRadar’s Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) platform is designed to assist organizations in proactively identifying, analyzing, and mitigating cyber threats through an effective approach. Utilizing sophisticated analytics, machine learning, and the expertise of human analysts, our XTI platform offers contextualized and actionable intelligence to help organizations safeguard their digital assets and minimize the risk of cyberattacks.
htmlDescription:
As a cyber threat intelligence company, SOCRadar provides comprehensive threat intelligence and security automation capabilities to help organizations detect, investigate, and respond to cyber threats in real time. The company aims to provide a safer digital world and sustain a better security surface while prioritizing proactive security and constantly analyzing the hacker mindset. SOCRadar supports enterprises in maximizing the efficiency of their security teams with false-positive, free, actionable, and contextualized threat intelligence.

Cyber threat intelligence involves routine tasks that are often performed manually. These tasks may include collecting data from various sources, analyzing collected data, and identifying potential threats. While automation and machine learning can significantly reduce the manual workload, human expertise remains essential for recognizing the context, validating the accuracy of intelligence, and making strategic data-driven decisions.

SOCRadar’s Extended Threat Intelligence (XTI) platform is designed to assist organizations in proactively identifying, analyzing, and mitigating cyber threats through an effective approach. Utilizing sophisticated analytics, machine learning, and the expertise of human analysts, our XTI platform offers contextualized and actionable intelligence to help organizations safeguard their digital assets and minimize the risk of cyberattacks.

htmlDescription:
Security-First Identity Solutions.

RSA provides identity security solutions for the world's most security-sensitive organizations.

RSA delivers automated identity intelligence, authentication, access, governance, and lifecycle capabilities to defend against the highest-impact cybersecurity risks

documents.name: RSA® Risk AI
documents.description: RSA® Risk AI intuitively determines user risk before granting access to secured systems and data, keeping bad actors out and letting trusted users in.

documents.name: RSA® Governance & Lifecycle Cloud
documents.description: RSA® Governance & Lifecycle Cloud allows organizations to gain identity assurance into who has access to what resources

documents.name: RSA® Mobile Lock
documents.description: RSA® Mobile Lock detects critical threats to a mobile device and restricts the user’s ability to authenticate until the threat issue is resolved

documents.name: ID Plus: DS100 Authenticator
documents.description: The DS100 is a passwordless, multi-functional security solution with FIDO protocols

documents.name: The RSA Unified Identity Platform
documents.description: Read our Solution Brief to learn how to address unnecessary risks, save costs, and enhance productivity with a unified identity platform.
